newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: POLL-Bank/Portugal could cut rates Friday.
newsitem.headline: POLL-Bank/Portugal could cut rates Friday.

text.p: The Bank of Portugal could cut key rates on Friday afternoon, and the probability of doing so would increase sharply if the Bank of Spain cuts key rates on Friday morning, analysts said.

Among 10 analysts of banks and brokers polled by Reuters, four said they expected cuts in the repo rate and three a cut in the draining rate, used to absorb excess funds from the money market, independent of any Spanish decision.
Another three analysts said a decision to cut Portuguese key rates would depend on Spanish rate cuts. And a further three analysts said they expected no Portuguese rate cuts.
All the analysts polled said they believed that Portugal had room to cut key rates further.
The results of the poll are as follows:
1. Will the Bank of Portugal cut the repo rate this week?
Yes - 4
No - 6
2. If the answer to question 1. is affirmative, by how much will the Bank of Portugal cut the repo rate?
Between 10 and 25 basis points
3. Will the Bank of Portugal cut the draining rate this week?
Yes - 3
No - 7
4. If the answer to question 3. is affirmative, by how much will the Bank of Portugal cut the repo rate?
Between 20 and 40 basis points
5. Is there room for further rate cuts?
Yes - 10
No - 0
6. Will the Bank of Portugal cut rates only if the Bank of Spain cuts its rates?
Yes - 3
No - 7
-- Fernanda Pargana, Lisbon newsroom +351-1-3538254
